title: Post Malone makes it rain $50K by throwing fistfuls of singles while clubbing in Miami
text:
Post Malone was feeling like a rock star while clubbing in Miami, chugging from beer bongs and making it rain $50K in cash, insiders told DailyMail.com.

The highlight of the wild night was when the rapper brought a water cooler stuffed with single dollar bills on stage while performing at 24-hour club E11EVEN on Saturday night.

The 24-year-old counted out stacks of money before throwing it into the crowd, as people fought to snatch up fistfuls of bills.

In a separate video exclusively obtained by DailyMail.com, Post Malone cracked jokes to the crowd while a crate of Bud Lights adorned with sparklers made its way through the club.

He jokingly remarked: 'This s**t is fancy, this s**t is way more fancier than your Dom Perignon.'

Post Malone was feeling like a rock star while clubbing in Miami, chugging from beer bongs and making it rain $50K in cash, insiders told DailyMail.com

In a separate video exclusively obtained by DailyMail.com, Post Malone cracked jokes to the crowd while a crate of Bud Lights adorned with sparklers made its way through the club. He remarked: 'This s**t is fancy, this s**t is way more fancier than your Dom Perignon'

He called out to the club: 'We need more Bud Lights with the sparklers!' A source told DailyMail.com that Post Malone, whose real name is Austin Richard Post, cracked jokes during his set and interacted with the crowd, staying at the club until the early morning

He called out to the club: 'We need more Bud Lights with the sparklers!'

During his wild night at the Miami hot spot, the musician was seen doing beer bongs with his entourage at his VIP table before performing his hits Rockstar, Psycho and White Iverson.

A source told DailyMail.com that Post Malone, whose real name is Austin Richard Post, cracked jokes during his set and interacted with the crowd, staying at the club until the early morning.

Fans left with cash in their pockets, as the insider explained the night was a 'win-win for everyone.'

The source added: 'He arrived with a large entourage and his whole crew couldn't have been nicer.

'He was having a ball dancing, goofing around and being funny.

'There were a bunch of girls at the table dancing but he was not flirting with anyone specific. His table was like a college party.'

The rapper brought a water cooler stuffed with single dollar bills on stage while performing at 24-hour club E11EVEN on Saturday night. The 24-year-old counted out stacks of money before throwing it into the crowd, as people fought to snatch up fistfuls of bills

The source added: 'He arrived with a large entourage and his whole crew couldn't have been nicer. He was having a ball dancing, goofing around and being funny'

Fans left with cash in their pockets, as the insider explained the night was a 'win-win for everyone'

Insiders at E11EVEN said Post Malone's good vibes and antics made the club the most high-energy packed nights that they've ever had.

Post Malone has been bringing the fun with him while touring.

He was seen on Friday playing beer pong backstage at his concert in Atlanta with former Real Housewives of Atlanta star Kim Zolciak and her daughter Brielle Biermann.

Zolciak documented the night on Instagram, writing the rapper 'has taught me that people with amazing hearts succeed!'

She added: 'Don't let the negative get to you ... we have all been screwed over! Pick those pieces up be you ... don't let your heart harden ... karma is real.'

Last week, the singer played 'strip beer pong' at gentleman's club FlashDancers in Manhattan, the New York Post reported.

He reportedly also splashed out $50k at the joint and 'undergarments were soon flying', with sources telling the outlet he was 'the nicest celebrity who has ever been in.'
description: Post Malone, 24, made it rain cash on fans while clubbing at 24-hour club E11EVEN in Miami on Saturday night. The rapper guzzled Bud Lights with his friends until the early hours of the morning
